titleStmt.title: The bull of Pope Alexander VIII. Published two days before his death. Annulling all the proceedings of the French clergy, assembled at Paris, 1682 Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Alexander VIII, Pope, 1610-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones in the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and actual date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Wing reports date of publication as 1690[1].
The Latin part has caption title: Alexander Papa VIII.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
